title: Stack from runtime.Caller doesn't match stack from panic
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

http://groups.google.com/group/golang-nuts/browse_thread/thread/d593b13d4b430a26

What is the expected output?

runtime.goexit /home/alberts/go/src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:149

What do you see instead?

runtime.goexit /home/alberts/go/src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:145

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

6g

Which operating system are you using?

linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

tip
